data.question: What is the pore size of SIFSIX-2-Cu?
What method was used to determine the BET apparent surface area?
What is the CO2 uptake of SIFSIX-2-Cu-i at 298 K and 1 bar?
What is the CO2/N2 selectivity of SIFSIX-2-Cu-i?
What is the pore size of SIFSIX-3-Zn?
What is the CO2 adsorption selectivity of SIFSIX-3-Zn for CO2/N2:10/90 mixture?
Does SIFSIX-2-Cu-i exhibit higher CO2 uptake than SIFSIX-2-Cu?
Is the Qst of CO2 adsorption for SIFSIX-2-Cu-i higher than that for SIFSIX-3-Zn?
What is the effect of humidity on the CO2 capacity and selectivity of SIFSIX-2-Cu-i and SIFSIX-3-Zn?
data.answer: Water adsorption affinity/capacity is reduced in the presence of CO2 gas mixtures.

data.question: What is the CO2/CH4 selectivity of SIFSIX-3-Zn for CO2/CH4:50/50 mixture?
Is SIFSIX-3-Zn suitable for pre-combustion capture or H2 purification?
Does SIFSIX-3-Zn undergo a phase change when exposed to high humidity?
What is the CO2 uptake of SIFSIX-3-Zn at 0.1 bar?

What is the effect of increasing adsorption temperature on the steepness of the CO2 adsorption isotherm for SIFSIX-3-Zn?
data.answer: Increasing the adsorption temperature did not significantly reduce the steepness of the CO2 adsorption isotherm for SIFSIX-3-Zn.
